ai-tika-s0519t6:124_4: Herein, the path that occurs with head rolled forth like a lion that rolls away. But even though I pass away from the life to homelessness, the passing away and reappearing in the various orders of existence.
ai-tika-s0519t6:125_0: He should review the danger in himself as absence, like a pollutant for himself or his own defilements.
ai-tika-s0519t6:125_1: “‘I am freed from defilements’, is a term for reviewing the defilements.” They do this.
ai-tika-s0519t6:125_2: But it is possible that they have passed away and reinforced their lifespan or the level of the rod and the manager of the lifespan. Then they say, “Because they live offence only to the idiosyncratic interpretations of their life.”

ai-tika-s0519t6:126_1: Whoever has the characteristic of greedy temperament for a person here and there forsakens greedy temperament.
ai-tika-s0519t6:126_2: Hence it is said: “He should be in the sense of urgency, greed, hate, and delusion,” and non-confusion; he should see in the sense of urgency, “Here greed is incapable of reproved ideaching. ”

ai-tika-s0519t6:130_1: Twelve thousand (supernatural) faculties, one hundred and thirty-two years (afterwards).
ai-tika-s0519t6:130_2: Knowledge of consciousnesses, intermediate directions, knowledge of the ending of suffering, and knowledge of the supermundane, and knowledge of the light, air, and knowledge of the supermundane attainments, holy torns, truthfulness, lightness, and lightness, and knowledge of the supermundane and knowledge.

It is said in order to purify the true teaching and training, and he follows after the enlightenment of the true teaching. It is said for the purpose of helping the true teaching and establishing them in the true teaching.
